contentList.content: Seize air and compel it to possibly push a creature up to [1] or an object up to [2] away from you.
%%% Create a harmless bonfire that emits light for [1].
%%% Brighten an area in a [1] radius.
Manipulate a water surface and freeze it to become an ice surface.
Manipulate a water surface to change its shape and freeze it into a block of ice.
Manipulate a water surface to move to a different location.

Absorb incoming elemental energy, lessening its effect on you and store it for your next melee attack. Take half damage from the next elemental attack targetting you, and deal an additional [1] of that element type on your next attack.

Absorb incoming elemental energy, lessening its effect on you and store it for your next melee attack. Take half damage from the next elemental attack targetting you, and deal an additional [1] of that element type on your next attack.
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Acid damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Cold damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Fire damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Lightning damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Thunder damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
Grants a friendly or charmed beast <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you.
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of the bonded target.
Bonded beast has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you that you can see.
Retrieve a light object from the ground and launch it at a creature.
Awaken the sense of mortality in a creature, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightening</LSTag> it.
The affected creature repeats the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> at the end of its turns.
Perform one of many beneficial religious ceremonies.

Touch a creature, granting it Advantage on Ability Checks and Saving Throws using Wisdom.

At the end of each turn, the target must pass a DC 20 Wisdom Saving Throw or take [1].

Has Advantage on Ability Checks and Saving Throws using Wisdom.

Must pass a DC 20 Wisdom Saving Throw at the end of each turn or take [1].
Touch a container of water in a creature's inventory, causing it to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS_WATER">Holy Water</LSTag>.
Touch a humanoid creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Touch a humanoid creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Perform funeral rites for a corpse.

Touch two humanoid creatures, bonding them together in marriage. For the next [1] days, each target gains +[2] to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> while they are within [3] of each other.

Happily Married!

For the next [1] days, gain +[2] to your Armor Class while within [1] of your partner.

Cause a tremor in the ground, miring the area around yourself in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">thick mud</LSTag> and possibly knocking nearby creatures <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Freezing cold blasts from your fingertips.
Force an enemy to reroll a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Can't be used again while still affected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILVERY_BARBS">Silvery Barbs</LSTag>.

Force an enemy to reroll their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. Then gain the ability to give a friendly creature advantage on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Give a friendly creature <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.

Can grant one nearby friendly creature Advantage on their next Attack Roll or Saving Throw.

Removed after usage.

Place a magical trap that captures enemies that walk within [1] of it. It is triggered when a Small or larger creature moves near it, possibly causing all nearby creatures to be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNARE_TRAP">Restrained</LSTag>

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNARE_TRAP">Restrained</LSTag> creatures make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success. Another creature can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Help</LSTag> them to end the effect as well.
The snare activates when stepped on by an enemy and traps them.
Cover a creature in corrosive acid for as long as you maintain <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>, dealing [1] at the start of each of the creatures turns.
Takes [1] at the start of their turn.
Move like the wind, allowing you to avoid provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.

Until the spell ends, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> which deals an additional [1]. Hit or miss, you gain an additional [2] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> until the end of that turn.
Can move without provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Roaring flame emanates from you in a line, dealing [1] to all creatures caught in its path.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in one skill you lack proficiency in.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in [1] if you're not already proficient.
Imbue an ally with the power to spew magical energy from their mouth.
Imbue an ally with the power of a black dragon's acid breath.
Imbue an ally with the power of a white dragon's frost breath.
Imbue an ally with the power of a red dragon's fire breath.
Imbue an ally with the power of a blue dragon's lightning breath.
Imbue an ally with the power of a green dragon's poison breath.
Gained ability to exhale draconic acid breath.
Gained ability to exhale draconic frost breath.
Gained ability to exhale draconic fire breath.
Gained ability to exhale draconic lightning breath.
Gained ability to exhale draconic poison breath.
Gain the service of [1] familiars, each a fey spirit that takes an animal form you choose.
Summon [1] imp familiars that can fly, turn Invisible, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Sting_Imp_Summon">Sting</LSTag> enemies.
Summon [1] quasit familiars that can turn Invisible and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Scare_Quasit_Summon">Scare</LSTag> enemies.

Magically empower your movement, giving yourself an additional [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and the ability to avoid <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> increased by [1] and don't provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Invade the mind of the target and prevent them from turning invisible.
Enchant all creatures within [1] of the target location with a random debilitating effect at the start of each turn.
Fill an area with fey and draconic magic, producing random, magical effects when the spell is cast and at the start of your turns.
Can't attack spellcaster. Spellcaster has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> in dialogue.

Has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls. Range of attacks and spells reduced to [1].

Attack Rolls against Blinded creatures have Advantage.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> halved as if walking on <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
A flurry of magic snowballs erupt around a [1] radius of the targeted area.
Call forth a bestial spirit from an environment of Air or Land.
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from the environment of Air.
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from the environment of Land.
Psychically lash out at the target to prevent them from moving and taking reactions until the end of their next turn.
Affected entity can't take reactions and it must choose whether it uses movement, takes an action, or a bonus action; it gets only one of the three.
You can't take an action, a bonus action, and movement. If you take an action, you lose a bonus action and movement, and vice versa.
Magically twist space around another creature up to [1] away and teleport them to an unoccupied space.
Can be teleported by Vortex Warp.
Magically twist space around another creature and teleport them up to [1] away.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ANTAGONIZE">Antagonize</LSTag> a creature: they'll have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and can't take reactions until the start of your next turn.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and can't take reactions.

Billowing dragon flames blast from your feet, burning creatures within [3] for [1].

Increases movement speed by [2] and moving no longer provokes Opportunity Attacks.
Increase movement speed by [1] and deal an additional [2] per level.

Surrounded with billowing flames that burn nearby entities for [1].

Movement Speed increased by [1] and do not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Takes [1] per turn.

Removed upon leaving the area.
Make a calming gesture that forces targeted allies to fall unconscious and gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.

Affected entity falls asleep for 10 rounds. When it wakes up, it receives the effects of a Short Rest and all 1st and 2nd level spell slots are restored.

If interrupted before the duration expires, the effects will not apply.
Create several pounds and gallons of food and water as camp supplies.
Reach into a creature's mind, causing it to lose the ability to distinguish friend from foe.

Affected entity is hostile to everyone and may wander around aimlessly.

When it takes damage, the entity can try to shake off the effect.
Touch a ranged weapon held by a creature, causing up to [1] attacks with it to deal an extra [2].
Ranged attacks using affected weapon deal an additional [1].

Grant yourself or a target <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to psychic damage as well as <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to psychic damage.
Sacrifice some of your life to mend another creature's injuries. You take [1] and the targeted creature regains <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> equal to twice the damage you take.
Conjure [2] flaming meteors that can be sent streaking toward enemies to explode in a [3] radius dealing [1].
Can throw minute meteors at enemies.
Can throw minute meteors at enemies.
Can throw minute meteors at enemies for free.
Can throw minute meteors at enemies.
Hurl a minute meteor at the target that explodes in a [1] radius.

Motivate up to 5 creatures. They gain +[1] and advantage on Wisdom Saving Throws.

If an affected entity is hit by an attack it has Advantage on the next Attack Roll.

Gain [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> after being hit by an attack.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

Call forth spirits of the dead that flit around you. Attacks you make against creatures within [1] of you deal an extra [2], [3] or [4] and prevents them from regaining <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Hostile creatures that start their turns within [1] of you have its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> reduced by [1].
Call forth spirits of the dead that flit around you. Attacks you make against creatures within [1] of you deal an extra [2] prevents them from regaining <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.

Nearby enemies have [1] of reduced movement speed.

When you attack a nearby enemy deal an extra [2] and prevent them from regaining hit points until your next turn.
Susceptible to taking additional damage from spellcaster.

Call forth a fey spirit with a chosen mood: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUMMON_FEY_FUMING">Fuming</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUMMON_FEY_MIRTHFUL">Mirthful</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUMMON_FEY_TRICKSY">Tricksy</LSTag>.
Call forth a frenzied fey spirit that channels its rage in melee combat.

This summoned fey is furious. After using its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FeyStep_Fuming">Fey Step</LSTag> ability, it has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Afterwards, get <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Call forth a delightful fey spirit able to charm enemies.
This summoned fey is positively captivating. After using its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FeyStep_Mirthful">Fey Step</LSTag> ability, it can charm a nearby enemy.
Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Afterwards, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MirthfulCharm">charm</LSTag> an enemy.
Charms a nearby enemy, preventing it from attacking you.
Call forth a mischievous fey spirit able to call forth patches of darkness.

This summoned fey is up to something. When using its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FeyStep_Tricksy">Fey Step</LSTag> ability, it can create a patch of darkness that lasts until the end of its next turn.
Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Afterwards, you can create a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Darkness_Tricksy">patch of darkness</LSTag> that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Can create a small patch of darkness.
Create a small patch of darkness.

Call forth a shadow spirit of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SummonShadowspawn_Fury">Fury</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SummonShadowspawn_Despair">Despair</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SummonShadowspawn_Fear">Fear</LSTag>.
While in dim light or darkness, the spirit is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHADOW_STEALTH">stealthed</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag> made from against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> targets have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Enemy <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> within is reduced by [2] when within [1].
Enemy <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is reduced by [2] when within [1].
Strike the target with a freezing cold touch.

Cannot move. Frightened entities also have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Call forth a shadowy spirit that embodies the emotion of Fear, allowing it to take the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide_ShadowStealth">Hide</LSTag> action as a bonus action while in dim light or darkness.

Call forth a shadowy spirit that embodies the emotion of Fury, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> creatures.
Call forth a shadowy spirit that embodies the emotion of Despair, causing creatures other than you within [1] of it to have its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> reduced by [2].
Teleport yourself and up to 1 adjacent ally to a place you can see. A thunderous boom damages all creatures within [1] of the space you left.
The ally cannot be larger than medium.
Grant allied creatures the ability to move across any liquid surface as if it were harmless solid ground.
Surfaces include water, electrified water, electrified blood, mud, poison and grease.
Create an invisible, magical eye that can scout the path ahead for you.

An aura of life-preserving energy radiates from you in a [1] radius. Allied creatures in the aura have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> against Necrotic damage, their hit point maximum cannot be reduced and living creatures regain [2] when starting their turns with [3].

Radiate an aura that grants all nearby allies <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage, hit point maximums cannot be reduced, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOWNED">Downed</LSTag> allies will regain [1] hit point at the start of their turn.

Radiate an aura that grants all nearby allies <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage, hit point maximums cannot be reduced, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOWNED">Downed</LSTag> allies will regain [1] hit point at the start of their turn.

This entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> against Necrotic damage, its hit point maximum cannot be reduced and it regains [1] at the start of its turn if <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOWNED">Downed</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> a creature to prevent it from attacking you. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> in dialogue.
Enemies have Advantage on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being Charmed.
Call forth a nature spirit to transform you into a powerful guardian.

Bestial fur covers your body and your facial features become feral.

Your Movement Speed is increased by [1], you gain darkvision with a range of [2], your Strength-based Attack Rolls are made with Advantage and your melee weapon attacks deal an extra [3].

Your skin turns to bark and leaves begin to sprout from your hair.

You gain [1], you make Constitution Saving Throws with Advantage, you make Dexterity and Wisdom-based Attack Rolls with Advantage and the ground within [2] of you is Difficult Terrain.

<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> increased by [1], gains [2] darkvision, Strength-based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> are made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and melee weapon attacks deal an extra [3].

Gains [1].

Gains advantage on Constitution Saving Throws and make Dexterity and Wisdom-based Attack Rolls with Advantage.

The area within [2] of the entity is considered Difficult Terrain.
Unleash a shimmering lance of psychic power at a creature, possibly causing it to be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitated</LSTag>.

Flame-like shadows wreathe your body, causing you to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> to radiant damage and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING_HEAVILY_OBSCURED">Heavily Obscured</LSTag> to others.
Whenever a creature within [1] hits you with an attack, the shadows lash out at that creature, dealing [2].

The entity is Heavily Obscured by thick shadows exuding up to [1] away from it.

Gains Resistance to Radiant damage.

Creatures attacking the entity within [1] take [2].
Deal [1] when a nearby creature lands an attack.
A [1] radius sphere of whirling air springs into existence. Creatures in the sphere when it appears or that ends its turn there takes [2]. The spheres space is difficult terrain.

You can use a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">bonus action</LSTag> to cause a bolt of lightning to leap from the sphere towards a creature within [1], dealing [2]. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> if the target is in the sphere.

A sphere of whirling air buffets enemies that stand too close.

Creatures starting their turn in the area possibly take [1].

The area within [2] of the sphere is Difficult Terrain.
Standing near a storm sphere that buffets them at the end of each turn for [1].
Electricity surges through the air, priming enemies within [1] for electrocution.
Primed for electrocution while standing within [1] of a storm sphere.
Can call forth lightning to strike those who stand near the storm sphere.
Call down a lightning bolt to hit a target near the storm sphere.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>on the attack roll if the enemy is standing within [1] of the sphere.

Call forth an aberrant spirit of a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SummonAberration_Beholderkin">Beholderkin</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SummonAberration_MindFlayer">Mind Flayer</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SummonAberration_Cloaker">Cloaker</LSTag> aberration.
Summon an aberrant spirit resembling a beholderkin.
Summon an aberrant spirit resembling a mind flayer.
Summon an aberrant spirit resembling a cloaker.
Shoot an eye ray that deals psychic damage.
Shoot an eye ray that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION_RAY">Befuddles</LSTag> its target.
Shoot an eye ray that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightens</LSTag> its target.
Shoot an eye ray that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED_SPECTATOR">Paralyzes</LSTag> its target.
Spew forth a conical wave of psychic energy.
Target cannot regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> until the start of your next turn.
Target cannot regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> until the start of your next turn.
At the beginning of your turn, heal you [1].
Emits aberrant psionic energy at the start of its turn to all creatures within [1], dealing [2] on a failed Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Damages all creatures within [1] at the start of its turn.
This entity's proximity to the mind flayer spirit causes it to be caught up in the aberrant psionic energy. Takes [1] on a failed Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Call forth the spirit of a Metal construct that burns enemies for [1] when they land a melee attack.
Deal [1] when a nearby creature lands a melee attack.
Call forth an elemental spirit of air, earth, fire or water that fights alongside you.
Buffet a foe with deafening winds, extinguishing any active fire sources and leaving behind a thick cloud layer.
Descend on a creature to buffet it with multiple swipes.
Call forth an elemental servant of air that fights alongside you.
Call forth an elemental servant of earth that fights alongside you.
Call forth an elemental servant of fire that fights alongside you.
Call forth an elemental servant of water that fights alongside you.
Shoot a glowing ball of green acid that explodes in a [1] radius, covering the ground with acid. Deals [2] immediately and [3] at the end of the target's turn.
Takes [1] at the end of the turn.
Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Until the spell ends, you can teleport in this way again as a bonus action on your turns.
Imbue a weapon with holy power. It becomes a magical weapon, emits light in a [1] radius, and deals an extra [2].

As a bonus action, you can cause the weapon to emit a burst of radiance, dealing [1] to creatures within [2] of you and possibly causing them to be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
Weapon has become magical and deals an additional [1].
Emit a burst of radiance from the weapon, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> creatures.
This action ends the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HolyWeapon">Holy Weapon</LSTag> spell.

A swirling mass of [1]-deep water appears in a [2] radius centered on a point you can see within range. Until the spell ends, that area is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and any creature that starts its turn there must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take damage and be pulled [3] toward the center.
This entity is caught in the maelstrom, taking damage and being pulled toward the center at the start of its turn.

Send ribbons of negative energy at a creature, dealing [1] if they aren't undead. Targets killed by this damage rise up as a zombie at the start of your next turn and become hostile to all creatures. If the target is an undead, they gain [2] instead.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to half of [1].
Reanimates as a zombie at the start of next turn.
Flourish a melee weapon and then vanish to strike like the wind, dealing [1] up to five creatures.
Before moving again, teleport to a target hit by Steel Wind Strike.
Teleport next to a target of Steel Wind Strike.
Transmute your quiver so it produces an endless supply of nonmagical ammunition. You can use a bonus action to make two ranged weapon attacks per turn until the spell ends.
Make two ranged attacks with the equipped weapon.

Detonate psychic energy that inflicts targets with a -1d6 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> to maintain concentration.

Has a -1d6 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> to maintain concentration. Makes an Intelligence saving throw each turn to break free.
Endow yourself with endurance and martial prowess fueled by magic, preventing you from casting spells but granting you gain several benefits.
When the condition ends, you must pass a DC 15 Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or suffer one level of Exhaustion.

This entity has Advantage on Attack Rolls with weapons, deals an extra [2] with weapon attacks, has proficiency with all armor, shields and weapons, has proficiency in Strength and Constitution Saving Throws and attack twice, instead of once, when taking the Attack action on its turn.

Cannot cast spells.
Touch a creature - it can see <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag> creatures and pierce the planes with its eyes.
The target can also see through illusions created by spells and automatically save against any that would force a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Can see any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures and objects.
When you are targeted by an Illusion spell that forces you to make a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can automatically succeed on the save.
